attributes.action: Speed Up the deportation of illegal immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more and more illegal immigrants pour into out tiny country, untold damage is being caused to the very infrastructure of it. Also, the indigenous population are finding themselves being pushed aside over this high tide of, sometimes, totally undesireable influx of people. All illegals must be deported withing 76 hrs of being caught.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Speed Up the deportation of illegal immigrants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11867.asp

Prime Minister's Office
